vote.title: Authorize (1) a preliminary adoption of Substantial Amendment No.5 to the Neighborhood Stabilization Program (NSP) 1 and NSP 3 to expand the target areas in the Action Plan as defined in Attachment A; and (2) a public hearing for public comments on February 10, 2021; and, at the conclusion of the public hearing approve the adoption of the Substantial Amendment No. 5 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize (1) a preliminary adoption of Substantial Amendment No.5 to the Neighborhood Stabilization Program (NSP) 1 and NSP 3 to expand the target areas in the Action Plan as defined in Attachment A; and (2) a public hearing for public comments on February 10, 2021; and, at the conclusion of the public hearing approve the adoption of the Substantial Amendment No. 5 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
